ragConfig.__comment_maxFileSizeInBytes: if set to -1 there is no restriction on size for files or recording - 5242880 => 5Mo
ragConfig.__comment_maxFilesByBubble_maxRecordings: if set to -1 there is no limit (all info availabe will be processed)
ragConfig.__comment_chunckSize: minimum caracters to get from RAG query before to send data to client
ragConfig.__comment_bubbleNamesAllowed_part1: if not specified / null / empty list, all bubbles where the bot is a member is managed. !!! CASE SENSITIVE !!!
ragConfig.__comment_bubbleNamesAllowed_part2: * can be used as wildcard at the end of a name to allow creation/management of bubble of the fly
